entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/9. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E32: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/9. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-04-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, evaluation of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, political and social self-categorization 2. factors influencing the consumption and savings decisions of families in Hungary 3. opinions about the EU accession and its consequences 4. reception of campaign about trading with women
entry.dcterms:subject: demography
international politics and organisations
mass political behavior, attitudes
labour and employment
political institutions, public administration
economic policy
business/industrial management and organisation
economic conditions and indicators
income, property and savings
gender and gender roles
migration
economic systems and development
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
